forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
